title: Banana Nicotine Pouches by Helwit
description: TRY HELWIT BANANA NICOTINE POUCHES Banana by Helwit nicotine pouches has a taste of banana, everyone´s favourite tropical fruit. Enjoy a combined flavour of fresh and sweet bananas. View all Helwit Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Medium Pouches Banana-flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users 7mg Per Gram | 3.5mg Per Pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT HELWIT FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Helwit is a new All White brand from Yoik. Helwit is created in Yoik's climate-smart factory in Gransholms Bruk outside Växjö, Sweden. The factory is self-sufficient through a hydropower plant located very close to the factory. Sustainability is in focus! MORE ABOUT BANANA NICOTINE POUCHES A deliciously sweet flavour with a fresh aftertaste. The taste of banana with the slight fresh mint for a refreshing nicotine experience. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Helwit Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Medium Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch) 7 MG Flavour Name: Banana Flavour: Fruity Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
